name: Veteran Adventurer
description: You wield both Magic and Sword.

description: What a gaudy glow, maybe it's rare?

description: Release the Kraken!

description: Who was smoking around the oxygen?

name: Fighter
description: I guess one sword just isn't enough

name: Steampunk
description: Is that a claw machine?

description: Horizontal stripes can make you look thinner.

description: Gotta keep your oxygen somewhere

description: Orange and Blue, how very fashionable

description: Store your oxygen in style!

name: Fishing Rod
description: Women want me, fish fear me

name: TV Test Screen
description: I wonder what's about to start playing?

name: Nutrient Chamber
description: A mycological marvel of technology

name: Arcanum
description: I thought the tesseract was a cube

name: Serenity
description: No need to play Koi

name: Horns
description: Someone took Devils advocate a little too far

name: Sword
description: That looks painful

description: Who gave this spacesuit headlights?

description: No one's impressed but it's better than nothing

name: Speakers
description: Why use headphones when you can make everyone listen

name: Steam Powered
description: Hearing powered by coal

name: Angelic
description: Truly halo's are a thing of beauty

name: Cap
description: DO NOT EAT!

description: A poker face that could rival the gods

name: Skull
description: Silence in the library please

name: Oraphim
description: Descent from heaven requires the proper equipment

name: Egg
description: Look at that happy lil fella

name: Mychael
description: He seems like a... Fungi

name: Monster
description: Whatever's out there, let's hope it's not these.

name: Human
description: That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind

name: Spaceface
description: They say space is a reflection of you

description: Help, my face is melting!

description: Race to the checkered flag

description: The symbol seems to glow, what does it mean?

description: Watch out for the go karts

name: Pentagram
description: Don't summon anything you shouldn't

description: Did you forget to post that?

description: Huh, where's the rest?

description: What is this stuff?

name: Drippy
description: There's neon goo on your arm... again.

description: Surely stitches aren't airtight

description: Surely this doesn't work

description: A Standard Issue White EVA Suit

description: The iconic orange suit of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration

description: A design inspired by an old Apollo/Skylab spacesuit

description: This suit seems unbound to any known nation by colours, perhaps it comes from elsewhere?

description: If you shout any attack names at me i'll be very dissapointed

name: Solid Gold Suit
description: Midas would be proud but surely this isn't practical.

description: Gold tinted for your viewing pleasure

description: Like Hubble. Like the telescope
